home.title: Frontend Developer
home.desc:
Hello! My name is Veronika Khalikova.

I am a design-oriented frontend developer with a keen eye for details and extensive experience in implementing design layouts. My main focus is on React (TypeScript), but I feel comfortable with Vue and Angular as well.

about.title: Veronika Khalikova
about.description: Senior UI/UX Developer. I possess a keen eye for detail, capable of precisely implementing design layouts and effectively solving complex layout tasks.
